EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Accounts and Other Receivables, Net, Current
AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, receivable from customers, clients, or other third-parties, and receivables classified as other due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsReceivableBilledForLongTermContr.label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage
AccountsReceivableBilledForLongTermContr.description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs but not paid. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccruedRentCurrent.label: Accrued Rent, Current
AccruedRentCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for contractual rent under lease arrangements. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccruedRentNoncurrent.label: Accrued Rent, Noncurrent
AccruedRentNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) for contractual rent under lease arrangements.

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

AccumulatedAmortizationOfDebtIssuanceCos.label: Accumulated Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements
AccumulatedAmortizationOfDebtIssuanceCos.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements.

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment, Excluding Capital Leased Assets
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Cumulative amount of depreciation, depletion and amortization (related to property, plant and equipment, but not including land or leased assets).

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Additional Paid in Capital
AdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Decrease for Tax Withholding Obligation
AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.description: Amount of decrease to equity for grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for option under share-based payment arrangement.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Recognition and Exercise
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition and exercise of award under share-based payment arrangement.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCh.label: Allowance for Doubtful Accounts Receivable, Charge-offs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCh.description: Amount of direct write-downs of receivables charged against the allowance for doubtful accounts.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.description: Amount of direct write-downs of accounts receivable charged against the allowance.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AmortizationOfLeaseIncentives.label: Amortization of Lease Incentives
AmortizationOfLeaseIncentives.description: Amount of amortization of lease incentive costs incurred by the lessor for the benefit of the lessee.

AssetRetirementObligation.label: Asset Retirement Obligation
AssetRetirementObligation.description: The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.description: Current assets (normally turning over within one year or one business cycle if longer) that are held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold within one year.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

BilledContractReceivables.label: Billed Contracts Receivable
BilledContractReceivables.description: Amounts due for billed services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the Company and, at a minimum, one other party. An example would be amounts billed to customers under contracts or programs but not paid as of the balance sheet date.

BillingsInExcessOfCost.label: Billings in Excess of Cost
BillingsInExcessOfCost.description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method.

BillingsInExcessOfCostCurrent.label: Billings in Excess of Cost, Current
BillingsInExcessOfCostCurrent.description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method that are expected to be realized within one year or one operating cycle, whichever is longer, from the reporting date.

CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.label: Capital Expenditures Incurred but Not yet Paid
CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.description: Future cash outflow to pay for purchases of fixed assets that have occurred.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAdditions.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Additions
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAdditions.description: Additions made to capitalized computer software costs during the period.

CapitalizedContractCostNet.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net
CapitalizedContractCostNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.label: Capital Leased Assets, Gross
CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of leased physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

CapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent.label: Capital Lease Obligations, Current
CapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent.description: Amount of capital lease obligation due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.label: Lease Obligation Incurred
CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.description: Amount of increase in lease obligation from new lease.

CapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent.label: Capital Lease Obligations, Noncurrent
CapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent.description: Amount equal to the present value (the principal) at the beginning of the lease term of minimum lease payments during the lease term (excluding that portion of the payments representing executory costs such as insurance, maintenance, and taxes to be paid by the lessor, together with any profit thereon) net of payments or other amounts applied to the principal, through the balance sheet date and due to be paid more than one year (or one operating cycle, if longer) after the balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.label: Capital Leases, Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Net
CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.description: The total gross amount less the charge for the use of the long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Five Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Four Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Three Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Two Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsIntere.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Interest Included in Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsIntere.description: Amount necessary to reduce net minimum lease payments to present value for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsPresen.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Present Value of Net Minimum Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsPresen.description: Present value of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, including amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementAmortization.label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Amortization Expense
CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementAmortization.description: The charge for the use of long-lived depreciable capital leased assets for the period.

CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Accumulated Depreciation
CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.description: The total charge for the use of long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivitiesD.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Discontinued Operations
CashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivitiesD.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities of discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

CashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivitiesD.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations
CashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivitiesD.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities of discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesD.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Discontinued Operations
CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesD.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of operating activities of discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Cash Paid
CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

CommonStockValueOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Value, Outstanding
CommonStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all classes of common stock held by shareholders. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized. These shares exclude common shares repurchased by the entity and held as treasury shares.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmo.label: Contracts Receivable, Claims and Uncertain Amounts
ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmo.description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts.

ContractWithCustomerAssetAccumulatedAllo.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerAssetAccumulatedAllo.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

ContractWithCustomerAssetCumulativeCatch.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Change in Measure of Progress
ContractWithCustomerAssetCumulativeCatch.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in measure of progress which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

ContractWithCustomerAssetCumulativeCatch.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Modification of Contract
ContractWithCustomerAssetCumulativeCatch.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from contract modification which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

ContractWithCustomerAssetIncreaseDecreas.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Increase (Decrease) for Contract Acquired in Business Combination
ContractWithCustomerAssetIncreaseDecreas.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from business combination.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerAssetReclassifiedToR.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Reclassified to Receivable
ContractWithCustomerAssetReclassifiedToR.description: Amount of decrease in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time from transfer to receivable due to right to consideration becoming unconditional.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityIncreaseDec.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Increase (Decrease) for Contract Acquired in Business Combination
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due, from business combination.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

ContractWithCustomerPerformanceObligatio.label: Contract with Customer, Performance Obligation Satisfied in Previous Period
ContractWithCustomerPerformanceObligatio.description: Amount of revenue recognized from performance obligation satisfied or partially satisfied in previous reporting periods. Includes, but is not limited to, change in transaction price.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciation.label: Cost, Depreciation
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciation.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

CostsInExcessOfBillingsOnUncompletedCont.label: Costs in Excess of Billings
CostsInExcessOfBillingsOnUncompletedCont.description: Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings.

CumulativeEffectOfNewAccountingPrinciple.label: Cumulative Effect of New Accounting Principle in Period of Adoption (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
CumulativeEffectOfNewAccountingPrinciple.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) to equity or (increase) decrease to net assets, resulting from the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DebtInstrumentRepurchaseAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Repurchase Amount
DebtInstrumentRepurchaseAmount.description: Fair value amount of debt instrument that was repurchased.

DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements, Gross
DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements, Net
DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangemen.label: Deferred Compensation Share-based Arrangements, Liability, Current and Noncurrent
DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangemen.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements.

DeferredFinanceCostsGross.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross
DeferredFinanceCostsGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsCapitalLossCarryforward.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Capital Loss Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsCapitalLossCarryforward.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible capital loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Derivative Instruments
DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

DeferredTaxAssetsGross.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsGross.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetNoncurren.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetNoncurren.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsNetCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsNetCurrent.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsNetNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxAssetsNetNoncurrent.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Not Subject to Expiration
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are not subject to expiration dates.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Subject to Expiration
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are subject to expiration dates.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.description: Amount, before allocation of a valuation allowances, of deferred tax assets attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards including, but not limited to, research, foreign, general business, alternative minimum tax, and other deductible tax credit carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Share-based Compensation Cost
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from share-based compensation.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Current
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as current.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseDef.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Debt Issuance Costs
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseDef.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from debt issuance costs.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGrossCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross, Current
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGrossCurrent.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as current.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGrossNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGrossNoncurrent.description: Gross amount of noncurrent deferred tax liabilities, which result from applying the applicable tax rate to taxable temporary differences pertaining to each jurisdiction to which the entity is obligated to pay income tax.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Employees' Gross Pay
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.description: Percentage of employees' gross pay for which the employer contributes a matching contribution to a defined contribution plan.

DepreciationAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
DepreciationAndAmortization.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

DerivativeAssetsCurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Current
DerivativeAssetsCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Current
DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Noncurrent
DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossFromDisposa.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) from Disposal of Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossFromDisposa.description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Costs of Goods Sold
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of costs of goods sold attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, General and Administrative Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of general and administrative expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Gross Profit (Loss)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of gross profit attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Interest Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of interest expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Income (Loss)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Revenue
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of revenue attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DividendsCommonStockCash.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Cash
DividendsCommonStockCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

DividendsPayableCurrent.label: Dividends Payable, Current
DividendsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

DueFromJointVentures.label: Due from Joint Ventures
DueFromJointVentures.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareBasicAndDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic and Diluted
EarningsPerShareBasicAndDiluted.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each share in instances when basic and diluted earnings per share are the same amount and reported as a single line item on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per share is the amount of net income or loss for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per share includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquival.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquival.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

EquipmentExpense.label: Equipment Expense
EquipmentExpense.description: This element represents equipment expense including depreciation, repairs, rentals, and service contract costs. This item also includes equipment purchases which do not qualify for capitalization in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. This item may also include furniture expenses.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Gross Profit (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of gross profit (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Net Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of net income (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Revenue (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of revenue from sale of product and rendering of service reported by equity method investee.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

FairValueConcentrationOfRiskAccountsRece.label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Accounts Receivable
FairValueConcentrationOfRiskAccountsRece.description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments, Net, Pretax
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, excluding oil and gas property and timber property.

GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GrossProfit.label: Gross Profit
GrossProfit.description: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic and Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted share of common stock or unit when the per share amount is the same for both basic and diluted shares.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.description: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic and Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic and diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation, when the per share amount is the same.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.description: The sum of the current income tax expense or benefit and the deferred income tax expense or benefit pertaining to pretax Income or Loss from continuing operations; income tax expense or benefit may include interest and penalties on tax uncertainties based on the entity's accounting policy.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
IncomeTaxesReceivable.description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationEquityInEarningsL.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Equity in Earnings (Losses) of Unconsolidated Subsidiary, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationEquityInEarningsL.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Leases, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible lease expense.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInBillingInExcessOfCostO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Billing in Excess of Cost of Earnings
IncreaseDecreaseInBillingInExcessOfCostO.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability reflecting cash payments received before the related costs have been incurred.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerAs.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Asset
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerAs.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingCapital.label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital
IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingCapital.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all assets and liabilities used in operating activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInUnbilledReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Unbilled Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInUnbilledReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amount of revenue for work performed for which billing has not occurred, net of uncollectible accounts.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToAcc.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToAcc.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of accelerated share repurchase agreements. An accelerated share repurchase program is a combination of transactions that permits an entity to purchase a targeted number of shares immediately with the final purchase price of those shares determined by an average market price over a fixed period of time.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCal.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Call Options and Warrants
